Grammar:   DataElement 6.0
Namespace: shr.test
Uses:      shr.core

Entry:      TheParent
Property:   TheProperty

    Element:    TheProperty
    Property:   Simple1

    Element:    TheProperty
    Property:   Simple2

    Element:    Simple1
    Value:      boolean

    Element:    Simple2
    Value:      boolean

Entry:    TheChild
Parent:   TheParent
Description: "Not valid because Simple2 is not a subclass of Simple1"
TheProperty.Simple1 substitute TheProperty.Simple2
